name: EX-Drones Pre-Alpha DEMO
description:
EX-DRONES Pre-Alpha DEMO Is A Prototype Version Of The Upcoming Game 'EX-Drones'.  EX-DRONES DEMO Is The Concept Of The Full Game, Which Is Based On The Future. The  Demo Version Is Fully Free For Everyone! They'll Get The Chance To Taste The Story Of EX-Drones.

The Development Of EX-Drones Has Started A Long Time Ago (Summer 2020) Which Is Getting Close To 1 Year Development! The Full Game Will Probably Be Out This Summer! We Are Excited As You!

EX-Drones Story Is Not Available Yet For The Audience. _SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR EX-DRONES PRE-ALPHA DEMO_

________MINIMUM________

•OS: WINDOWS 7/8/10

•PROCESSOR : INTEL CORE i3 8100

•GRAPHICS CARD: GeForce GT710 2GB LP- Radeon RX 550 2GB

•RAM: 4GB RAM

•DirectX: VERSION 11

•STORAGE: LESS THAN 1GB AVAILABLE SPACE

________RECOMMENDED________

•OS: WINDOWS 7/8/10

•PROCESSOR: INTEL CORE i5-6500

•GRAPHICS CARD: GeForce GTX 1050 3GB-R9 280X 3GB

•RAM: 6GB RAM 

 •DirectX: VERSION 11

_____SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR MAC_____

•PROCCESOR: INTEL (64-bit)  CORE I5-6500 OR BETTER (it might run on intel core duo but with not a good experience)

•RAM: 2GB RAM OR MORE

•STORAGE: LESS THAN 1GB AVAILABLE SPACE

•DISPLAY: ANY

_____SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR LINUX_____
  • 3 GHz Dual PROCESSOR 
  • 4 GB RAM
  • GTX 1050 2GB/ RADEON RX  550 2GB
  • 1090 x 1080 RESOLUTION (or any)
  • LESS THAN 1GB STORAGE SPACE
NOTICE: THESE ARE THE SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR THE DEMO VERSION, THE FULL VERSION WILL NEED HIGHER & FASTER SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
